DataElement.preferredName: Cosmetic Product Material Lot Number Text ISO21090.ST.SIMPLE.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An article intended to be rubbed, poured, sprinkled, or sprayed on or introduced into or otherwise applied to the human body for cleansing, beautifying, promoting attractiveness or altering the appearance. An alphanumeric string used to identify a particular batch of the product.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cosmetic Product Material Lot Number Text
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A substance that is intended to be applied to the body to promote attractiveness without affecting the body's structure or functions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._A defined quantity of manufactured material or product produced in a single manufacturing process or series of process steps so that it reasonably is expected to be homogeneous.:A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.:The words of something written.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A substance that is intended to be applied to the body to promote attractiveness without affecting the body's structure or functions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Concepts.definition: An immunotoxin containing epitope of Pseudomonas exotoxin (PE) with immunotherapeutic property. PE, a peptide toxin of 613 amino acids, consists of 3 functional domains: an amino-terminal receptor-binding domain, a middle translocation domain, and a carboxyl-terminal ADP-ribosylation domain. The last 5 carboxyl-terminal amino acids, Arg-Glu-Asp-Leu-Lys, are critical for its cytotoxic action.
The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Property.preferredDefinition: A defined quantity of manufactured material or product produced in a single manufacturing process or series of process steps so that it reasonably is expected to be homogeneous.:A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.:The words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A defined quantity of manufactured material or product produced in a single manufacturing process or series of process steps so that it reasonably is expected to be homogeneous.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains ST.NT so that it has no language.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
